title: Episode 57: The Infernal Machine
description:
After Marengo, Napoleon's secret police did battle with violent radicals in the political underground, culminating in a brush with death on Christmas Eve, 1800.
For the ad-free version of the show, visit: https://www.patreon.com/ageofnapoleon and pledge at least $2/month.
